24 
25  // Convenience functions for setting up bounded areas.
26  // Ground level can also be used for ceiling. ;)
27  void addGroundLevel(FloatingPoint height);
28  // Add 4 walls (infinite planes) bounding the space. In case this is not the
29  // desired behavior, can use addObject to add walls manually one by one.
30  // If infinite walls are undesirable, then use cubes.
31  void addPlaneBoundaries(FloatingPoint x_min, FloatingPoint x_max,
32  FloatingPoint y_min, FloatingPoint y_max);
33 
34  // Deletes all objects!
35  void clear();

38  // Generates a synthetic view
39  // Assumes square pixels for ease... Takes in FoV in radians.
40

52 
53  // Same thing, but also adds a noise in the *distance* of the measurement,
54  // given by noise_sigma (Gaussian noise). No noise in the bearing.
55  void getNoisyPointcloudFromViewpoint(
56  const Point& view_origin, const Point& view_direction,
57  const Eigen::Vector2i& camera_res, FloatingPoint fov_h_rad,
58  FloatingPoint max_dist, FloatingPoint noise_sigma, Pointcloud* ptcloud,

68  Layer<VoxelType>* layer) const;

70  FloatingPoint getDistanceToPoint(const Point& coords,

72 
73  // Set and get the map generation and display bounds.
74  void setBounds(const Point& min_bound, const Point& max_bound) {
75  min_bound_ = min_bound;
76  max_bound_ = max_bound;
77  }
78 
79  Point getMinBound() const { return min_bound_; }
80  Point getMaxBound() const { return max_bound_; }
81 
82  private:
83  template <typename VoxelType>
84  void setVoxel(FloatingPoint dist, const Color& color, VoxelType* voxel) const;
85 
86  FloatingPoint getNoise(FloatingPoint noise_sigma);
87 
88  // List storing pointers to all the objects in this world.
89  std::list<std::unique_ptr<Object> > objects_;
90 
91  // World boundaries... Can be changed arbitrarily, just sets ground truth
92  // generation and visualization bounds, accurate only up to block size.
93  Point min_bound_;
94  Point max_bound_;
95 
96  // For producing noise. Sets a fixed seed (0).
97  std::default_random_engine generator_;
98 };
